import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"删除部署密钥"} />


<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/deployments/{deployment_name}/delete_deploy_key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

删除指定部署的部署密钥。请求体中的 `id` 可以是完整的部署密钥（带前缀）、编码后的 token，或部署密钥的名称。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"请求"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"deployment_name","in":"path","description":"部署名称","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"请求体"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["id"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"要删除的 token。可以是该 token 的机密值，或该 token 的唯一名称。"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"PlatformDeleteDeployKeyArgs"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":""}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
